data.title: Equity Participation
data.description: Share in our success through meaningful equity opportunities as we grow and expand our market presence.

data.title: Innovation Focus
data.description: We encourage creative thinking and provide time for exploration and experimentation.

data.title: Growth Opportunities
data.description: Continuous learning with dedicated budgets for conferences, courses, and certifications.

data.title: Inclusive Culture
data.description: A diverse and supportive environment where all voices are heard and valued.

body.mapText: Work from anywhere in the world

items.quote: OpenObserve has proven to be a reliable and cost-effective solution built to address real-world challenges.
items.name: Wayne Creel

items.quote: [OpenObserve is] super fast, definitely very lightweight, and you can get started with an initial POC in two to three minutes to be honest.
items.name: Ajith Natarajan

items.quote: Today, I think we run our entire production logs through OpenObserve... itâ€™s been a phenomenal journey so far.
items.name: Shailesh Mangal

body.title: Our Tech
body.description: We're building the next generation of Observability. Here's what you'll work with.

features.title: Modern Stack
features.description: Our platform is built with Rust, Go, and TypeScript, leveraging the best tools for performance, reliability, and developer experience.

features.title: Cloud Native
features.description: We embrace Kubernetes, containerization, and cloud-native principles to build scalable, resilient systems.

features.title: Open Source
features.description: We believe in the power of open source and contribute back to the community that supports us.

body.title: Ready to Join Us?
body.description: We're looking for passionate individuals to help us build the future of observability. Check out our open positions and apply today.

seo.title: Careers at OpenObserve
seo.description: Discover exciting career opportunities and join the OpenObserve mission to build the future of observability.
